Package com.example.appointment.controller

Interface SQLControllerInterface

All Known Subinterfaces:
AppointmentAlertsInterface, AppointmentDataInterface, GetAppointmentsInterface, GetCustomersInterface
All Known Implementing Classes:
AddAppointmentController, AddCustomerController, ConnectionModel, ContactScheduleReportController, Controller, CustomerComboBoxModel, LoginController, MainController, ModifyAppointmentController, ModifyCustomerController, ReportsController, TotalCustomersCountryReportController, TotalCustomersMonthReportController, TotalCustomersTypeReportController, ViewCustomersController
public interface SQLControllerInterface
An interface that contains methods that are used in all controllers that will directly access the SQL database.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final ConnectionModel
    CONNECTION_MODEL
    The connection model object that is shared between controllers to maintain access to the database.

  • Method Summary

    Method
    Description
    default void
    closeSQLObjects(PreparedStatement preparedStatement)
     
    default void
    closeSQLObjects(PreparedStatement preparedStatement, ResultSet rs)
     
    default void
    closeSQLObjects(PreparedStatement preparedStatement, ResultSet rs, CachedRowSet crs)
    A method that closes all the SQL objects that are passed in.

  • Field Details

    • CONNECTION_MODEL

      static final ConnectionModel CONNECTION_MODEL
      The connection model object that is shared between controllers to maintain access to the database.

  • Method Details

    • closeSQLObjects

      default void closeSQLObjects(PreparedStatement preparedStatement, ResultSet rs, CachedRowSet crs) throws SQLConnectionDroppedException
      A method that closes all the SQL objects that are passed in. The point of this method is to reduce copying and pasting because this method gets called every time the database is accessed.
      Parameters:
      preparedStatement - A PreparedStatement that is passed in to be closed.
      rs - A ResultSet that is passed in to be closed.
      crs - A CachedRowSet that is passed in to be closed.
      Throws:
      SQLConnectionDroppedException - If a SQL error occurs that disrupts the connection to the database.

    • closeSQLObjects

      default void closeSQLObjects(PreparedStatement preparedStatement, ResultSet rs) throws SQLConnectionDroppedException
      Parameters:
      preparedStatement - A PreparedStatement that is passed in to be closed.
      rs - A ResultSet that is passed in to be closed.
      Throws:
      SQLConnectionDroppedException - If a SQL error occurs that disrupts the connection to the database.
      See Also:
      • closeSQLObjects(PreparedStatement, ResultSet, CachedRowSet)

    • closeSQLObjects

      default void closeSQLObjects(PreparedStatement preparedStatement) throws SQLConnectionDroppedException
      Parameters:
      preparedStatement - A PreparedStatement that is passed in to be closed.
      Throws:
      SQLConnectionDroppedException - If a SQL error occurs that disrupts the connection to the database.
      See Also:
      • closeSQLObjects(PreparedStatement, ResultSet, CachedRowSet)
